comments:
Build ID: I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:
1. create an ejb 3.0 project
2. code your logic
3. try to package the project as ejb client jar 


More information:
i create an ejb 3.0 project, i implemented all my logic and selected my project for the left panel, and tried to packge it as an ejb client jar the process broke and drop the
following exception:
